name: Sneek
description:
Snake game, mouse controlled.

Features:

  • Controlled with mouse
  • 3 game modes, 2 map styles, 3 map sizes
    • Classic: 1 static food
    • Normal and Random: Food amount depends on map size, food moves
    • Random: Food is random size. Smaller food moves faster
  • Online High-scores
  • Customizable snake
    • You can customize body and head textures, eye count, eye style, pupil style and colours for all of them
    • Players with custom name can save their customization online
    • You can load anyone's snake by giving their name
  • Very blue
